verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210>. O sing <WH7891> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068> a new <WH2319> song <WH7892>; for he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> marvellous things <WH6381> <WH8737>: his right hand <WH3225>, and his holy <WH6944> arm <WH2220>, hath gotten him the victory <WH3467> <WH8689>.
The YY <WH3068> hath made known <WH3045> <WH8689> his salvation <WH3444>: his righteousness <WH6666> hath he openly shewed <WH1540> <WH8765> in the sight <WH5869> of the heathen <WH1471>.

He hath remembered <WH2142> <WH8804> his mercy <WH2617> and his truth <WH530> toward the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: all the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776> have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> the salvation <WH3444> of our 'Elohim <WH430>.
Make a joyful noise <WH7321> <WH8685> unto the YY <WH3068>, all the earth <WH776>: make a loud noise <WH6476> <WH8798>, and rejoice <WH7442> <WH8761>, and sing <WH2167> <WH8761> praise.
Sing <WH2167> <WH8761> unto the YY <WH3068> with the harp <WH3658>; with the harp <WH3658>, and the voice <WH6963> of a psalm <WH2172>.
With shofars <WH2689> and sound <WH6963> of cornet <WH7782> make a joyful noise <WH7321> <WH8685> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, the King <WH4428>.
Let the sea <WH3220> roar <WH7481> <WH8799>, and the fulness <WH4393> thereof; the world <WH8398>, and they that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> therein.
Let the floods <WH5104> clap <WH4222> <WH8799> their hands <WH3709>: let the hills <WH2022> be joyful <WH7442> <WH8762> together <WH3162>

Before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>; for he cometh <WH935> <WH8804> to judge <WH8199> <WH8800> the earth <WH776>: with righteousness <WH6664> shall he judge <WH8199> <WH8799> the world <WH8398>, and the people <WH5971> with equity <WH4339>.
